card.name: Grasp of the Mycocyst
card.text: When Grasp of the Mycocyst enters the battlefield, create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except it's a Fungus in addition to its other types. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Grasp of the Mycocyst. When Infected Wretch has two or more spore counters on it, remove them and transform it. --- (Back): Mycogargantua

card.name: Mycogargantua
card.text: Whenever you cast a Fungus spell, copy it. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.) Whenever another permanent you control transforms into a Fungus, create a token that's a copy of it. --- (Front): Grasp of the Mycocyst

card.name: Baun's Apex
card.text: When Baun's Apex enters the battlefield, if it was cast, choose target nonland permanent an opponent controls. That permanent's owner shuffles it into their library. When Baun's Apex dies, return it to the battlefield transformed. --- (Back): Grafted Progress

card.name: Grafted Progress
card.text: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may shuffle it and Grafted Progress into their owner's libraries. If you do, take an extra turn after this one. Equip {2}{W}{U} --- (Front): Baun's Apex

card.name: Secrets of the Genome
card.text: Creature spells you cast can't be countered. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for a creature card with lesser mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Molecular Overdrive
card.text: When Molecular Overdrive enters the battlefield, each player loses 3 life and creates a 2/2 black and green Human Mutant creature token. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 3 life unless they control a Mutant. Then if no Mutants are on the battlefield, sacrifice Molecular Overdrive.

card.name: Necrobutcher
card.text: Menace Whenever a creature you control enters the battlefield or attacks, if its power is 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Necrobutcher. Then if Necrobutcher's power is 10 or greater, each opponent discards their hand.

card.name: Kuth Von, Gene Tyrant
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, you get {V} (a gene counter). Pay {V}{V}: Choose a counter on a permanent you control. Put a counter of that kind on target permanent you control if it doesn't have a counter of that kind on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Heavy Metal War
card.text: (As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it.) When Heavy Metal War enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent. When Heavy Metal War is defeated, you may put the exiled card onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Pulsating Growth
card.text: Pulsating Growth enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. You may put a spore counter on Pulsating Growth. When Pulsating Growth has two or more spore counters on it, remove them and transform it. --- (Back): Gnarled Pupa

card.name: Gnarled Pupa
card.text: Vigilance, menace {T}: Add {C}. --- (Front): Pulsating Growth

card.name: Partisan Hideout
card.text: Whenever a creature you control enters the battlefield or dies, you may put a refuge counter on Partisan Hideout. {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}, Exile Partisan Hideout: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of refuge counters on Partisan Hideout.

card.name: Genomic Blueprint
card.text: As Genomic Blueprint enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Triggered abilities of sources with the chosen name don't trigger.

card.name: Advanced Genomics
card.text: As Advanced Genomics enters the battlefield, choose two creature types. Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each of the chosen types they are.

card.name: Final Sequence
card.text: Flash Flying Final Sequence enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other spell cast this turn.

card.name: Encroaching Growth
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Draconic Mockery
card.text: Flash Flying, trample When Draconic Mockery enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature. When you do, Draconic Mockery deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

card.name: Hysterical Agony
card.text: Destroy target nonland, nonartifact permanent. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

card.name: Transit Chamber
card.text: Transit Chamber enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic Plains. {T}: Add {W}. {W}, Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: Until end of turn, Transit Chamber becomes a 2/3 white Horror creature with flying. It's still a land.

card.name: Observation Chamber
card.text: Observation Chamber enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic Island. {T}: Add {U}. {U}, Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: Until end of turn, Observation Chamber becomes a 4/4 blue Horror creature with vigilance. It's still a land.

card.name: Mortuary Chamber
card.text: Mortuary Chamber enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic Swamp. {T}: Add {B}. {B}, Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: Until end of turn, Mortuary Chamber becomes a 3/3 black Horror creature with menace. It's still a land.

card.name: Fusion Chamber
card.text: Fusion Chamber enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic Mountain. {T}: Add {R}. {R}, Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: Until end of turn, Synthesis Chamber becomes a 2/2 red Horror creature with double strike. It's still a land.

card.name: Synthesis Chamber
card.text: Synthesis Chamber enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a basic Forest. {T}: Add {G}. {G}, Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: Until end of turn, Synthesis Chamber becomes a 5/4 green Horror creature with trample. It's still a land.

card.name: Spinal Engineer
card.text: Lifelink When Spinal Engineer dies, return it to the battlefield transformed. --- (Back): Engineered Spine

card.name: Engineered Spine
card.text: Equipped creature has lifelink. Equip {2} --- (Front): Spinal Engineer

card.name: Membranous Martyr
card.text: {2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Membranous Martyr: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Lant Distiller
card.text: Sacrifice Lant Distiller: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Palmate Ganglion
card.text: When Palmate Ganglion enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Escaped Prototype
card.text: Unstable 1 (When this enters the battlefield, you get {V}, a gene counter. Spend {V} as a sorcery to put a listed counter on this. Duplicate counters cost {V} more.) Genes [b]|[/b] {V} Menace • {V} +1/+1

card.name: Withered Servitor
card.text: Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Flesh Column
card.text: Defender, lifelink

card.name: Rejected Subject
card.text: Vigilance Rejected Subject gets +2/+0 as long as you control two or more artifacts.

card.name: Bloodthresher
card.text: Flying, vigilance When Bloodthresher enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

card.name: Waste Product
card.text: When Waste Product enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Contagious Mutation
card.text: Destroy target creature if it dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Stasis Bay
card.text: When Stasis Bay enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life, then exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Stasis Bay leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Perfected Constitution
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains shielded until end of turn. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)

card.name: Urethra Implosion
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target artifact or enchantment. • Urethra Implosion deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Helix, Spatial Parasite
card.text: Emerge {3}{W}{W} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) When Helix, Spatial Parasite enters the battlefield, create X 1/1 white Human Insect creature tokens. If it emerged, X is the sacrificed creature's mana value.

card.name: Thrashing Abominant
card.text: Thrashing Abominant gets +X/+X, where X is your life total.

card.name: Forcible Augmentation
card.text: Create an Equipment artifact token named Implant with "Equipped creature gets +2/+2" and equip {3}. When you do, you may attach it to target creature.

card.name: Subterranean Sunrise
card.text: Until end of turn, whenever a nontoken permanent is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if it wasn't sacrificed, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Moulting Miracle
card.text: Vigilance, flying When Moulting Miracle dies, create a token that's a copy of it, except its base power and toughness are X/X, where X is one less than Moulting Miracle's base power.

card.name: Abhor
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller creates a token that's a copy of it, except it's 2/2 and has decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Scour Sterile
card.text: Destroy all augments, then destroy all non-host creatures. (Destroying an augment leaves the host behind.)

card.name: Pupating Seraph
card.text: Unstable 2 (When this enters the battlefield, you get {V}{V}, two gene counters. Spend {V} as a sorcery to put a listed counter on this. Duplicate counters cost {V} more.) Whenever another creature you control dies, you get {V}. Genes [b]|[/b] {V} Lifelink • {V} Flying • {V} +1/+1 • {V}{V}{V} Double strike

card.name: Human Plus
card.text: Shielded from Fungus (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to this by Fungus sources.) Human Plus gets +1/+1 for each other artifact you control. When Human Plus dies, return it to the battlefield transformed. --- (Back): Transhuman Plug

card.name: Transhuman Plug
card.text: Equipped creature has shielded from Fungus and gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control. Equip {1}{W} --- (Front): Human Plus

card.name: Parasite Incubator
card.text: When Parasite Incubator dies, if it wasn't an Insect, return it to the battlefield under your control with a +1/+1 counter and a flying counter on it. It's a Human Insect Horror. (It's no longer a Survivor.)

card.name: Apostate of Flesh
card.text: Ward—Remove a counter from a creature you control. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player removes a counter from a creature they control.) Double strike

card.name: Helix Researcher
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast as long as you've gained life this turn. When Helix Researcher enters the battlefield or dies, create a 1/1 white Human Insect creature token.

card.name: Contorted Cartilage
card.text: During your turn, Contorted Cartilage has first strike. Whenever a player draws a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Callous Grafter
card.text: Vigilance As Callous Grafter enters the battlefield, create an Equipment artifact token named Implant with "Equipped creature gets +2/+2" and equip {3} and attach it to Callous Grafter.

card.name: Necrodermal Experiment
card.text: During your turn, Necrodermal Experiment has first strike. At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've put a counter on a creature you control this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Necrodermal Experiment.

card.name: Suture Addict
card.text: Lifelink Equipped creatures you control have lifelink.

card.name: Argisem, the Bound
card.text: Double strike

card.name: Rejuvenat Therapy
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target artifact or enchantment you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. • Return target artifact or enchantment card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Endoskeletal Graft
Acquired Immunity
card.text: Acquired Immunity deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Neurografted Subject
card.text: Neurografted Subject enters the battlefield tapped. When Neurografted Subject enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Meager Flesh
card.text: {2}: Meager Flesh gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Avian Subject
card.text: Unstable 1 (When this enters the battlefield, you get {V}, a gene counter. Spend {V} as a sorcery to put a listed counter on this. Duplicate counters cost {V} more.) Genes [b]|[/b] {V} Flying • {V} Hexproof

card.name: Nutrient Medium
card.text: Target creature you control gains hexproof and shielded until end of turn. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.) Draw a card.

card.name: Into the Slurry Pipes
card.text: This spell costs {U} less to cast if you control a host or an augmented creature. Counter target spell.

card.name: Hypergenetic Discovery
card.text: Return target double-faced card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Thirst for Mutation
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard a double-faced card.

card.name: Viral Therapy
card.text: Enchant creature As Viral Therapy enters the battlefield, return all other cards attached to enchanted creature to their owners' hands. Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Mutant creature with base power and toughness 1/1.

card.name: Stark Isolation
card.text: Target creature's owner puts it on their choice of bottom of their library or into their library second from the top.

card.name: Amniotic Growth
card.text: For each kind of counter on target permanent or player, give that permanent or player another counter of that kind. Draw a card.

card.name: Protean Progeny
card.text: Flash When Protean Progeny enters the battlefield, if it was cast, counter target creature spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may have other creatures you control enter the battlefield as a copy of a card exiled with Protean Progeny.

card.name: Alpha, Genetic Martyr
card.text: Emerge {5}{U}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) When Alpha, Genetic Martyr enters the battlefield, draw X cards. If it emerged, X is the sacrificed creature's mana value.

card.name: Synaptic Degradation
card.text: Target player exiles the top half of their library, rounded up. When they do, they may search their library for a card, put into their hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Crabnormality
card.text: Spells your opponents cast that target Crabnormality cost {X} more to cast. where X is Crabnormality's power. Crabnormality can't be blocked by Humans. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Crabnormality.

card.name: Gather Specimens
card.text: If a creature would enter the battlefield under an opponent's control this turn, it enters the battlefield under your control instead.

card.name: Gene Sampler
card.text: As Gene Sampler enters the battlefield, choose DNA or RNA. • DNA — Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. • RNA —Artifacts spells you cast cost {1} less to cast and equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate.

card.name: Vatborn Gestator
card.text: You may have Vatborn Gestator enters the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types and has "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield transformed." --- (Back): Gestation Vat

card.name: Gestation Vat
card.text: Whenever Gestation Vat becomes attached to a creature, you may have that creature become a copy of any creature on the battlefield for as long as Gestation Vat is attached to it, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. Equip {2}{U} --- (Front): Vatborn Gestator

card.name: An Eruption of Meat
card.text: An Eruption of Meat enters the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Alpha Dissector
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast as long as you control a host or an augmented creature. When Alpha Dissector enters the battlefield or dies, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Fleshmaze Hulk
card.text: Flying Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Fleshmaze Hulk. If that artifact is an Equipment, you may attach it to Fleshmaze Hulk.

card.name: Tumbling Fleshdune
card.text: Whenever Tumbling Fleshdune attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Wall of Meat
card.text: Defender As long as you control a host or an augmented creature, Wall of Meat can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Coming Out of the Walls
card.text: Until end of turn, target nonland permanent you control becomes a 4/4 Human Ooze Construct creature. It can't be blocked this turn by creatures with power 3 or greater. Draw a card.

card.name: Blood's Reward
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Unsubstantiate
card.text: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Specimen Collection
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast as long as there are three or more different kinds of counters among creatures you control. Draw two cards.

card.name: Build Anew
card.text: Equipped creature is an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5. Equip {2}{U}

card.name: Unethical Research
card.text: Scry 1, then draw a card. You get {V} (a gene counter).

card.name: Distending Lurker
card.text: When Distending Lurker enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Gristle Gouger
card.text: Flying Gristle Gouger enters the battlefield tapped unless a creature died under your control this turn.

card.name: Abandoned Wastrel
card.text: When Abandoned Wastrel dies, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Engineered Bloatfly
card.text: Engineered Bloatfly has flying as long as a creature died this turn.

card.name: Pulsating Tangle
card.text: Menace Whenever Pulsating Tangle attacks, you lose 2 life unless you control another creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Corpse Thief
card.text: When Corpse Thief enters the battlefield, you may exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard.

card.name: Unstable Hybrid
card.text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card. If the sacrificed creature was a host or was augmented, draw two cards instead.

card.name: Tortured Artistry
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature type among non-Scientist cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Flesh Plasticity
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you control a host or augmented creature as you cast this spell, that creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn instead.

card.name: A Surfeit of Flesh
card.text: Choose one or both — • Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. • A Surfeit of Flesh deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Slice Me Nice
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay 4 life. Draw two cards.

card.name: Careful Autopsy
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it and exile that card. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.

card.name: Improper Handling
card.text: This spell costs {2} more to cast if it targets a host or an augmented creature. Destroy target creature.

card.name: Cystic Rupture
card.text: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. That creature's controller loses life equal to the number of card types among cards in your graveyard. (In the interest of scientific rigor, host is a supertype.)

card.name: Fleshmaze Prowler
card.text: During your turn, creatures your opponents control have base toughness 1. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, that player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Nemesis, Writhing Taboo
card.text: Emerge {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) When Nemesis, Writhing Taboo enters the battlefield, return any number of target creature cards with total mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it emerged, X is the sacrificed creature's mana value.

card.name: Captive Populace
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, creatures you don't control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Obscene Suckler

card.name: Brutal Surgery

card.name: Wave of Reckoning
card.text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

card.name: Malignant Growth
card.text: When Malignant Growth dies, you draw a card and each player loses 1 life.

card.name: Slave of Nemesis

card.name: Liquidate

card.name: Fiery Annihilation

card.name: Melt With You

card.text: Emerge {6}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) When Tyrant, the Hatemother enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to each other creature. If it emerged, X is the sacrificed creature's mana value.

card.name: Baun's Prototype
card.text: Menace Whenever Baun's Prototype deals combat damage to a player, choose one — • Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast this turn. • Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: Chemical Mitosis
card.text: For each creature on the battlefield, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 1/1. Those tokens gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Surgical Precision
card.text: Surgical Precision deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Until end of turn, whenever a permanent dealt damage this way is put into its owner's graveyard, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Twitching Symbiont
card.text: Each other creature you control that's a Fungus or that has a spore counter on it gets +1/+1 and has haste.

card.name: Concealed Investigator
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Concealed Investigator. When Concealed Investigator has two or more spore counters on it, remove them and transform it. card.name: Congealed Instigator
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains double strike until end of turn. --- (Front): Concealed Investigator

card.name: Wretched Revenant
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Tyrant's Spawn
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast as long an opponent lost life this turn. When Tyrant's Spawn enters the battlefield or dies, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Mycocyst Evangel
card.text: Damage can't be prevented. Whenever Mycocyst Evangel becomes the target of a spell, it deals 1 damage to each creature.

card.name: Recombinant Mauler
card.text: Whenever Recombinant Mauler or another nontoken creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 red Splinter creature token with haste.

card.name: Boundary Pusher
card.text: Menace When Boundary Pusher enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if that spell's mana value is 4 or less. If you don't, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Embryonic Potential
card.text: Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your library, then draw that many cards plus one.

card.name: Torturous Experience
card.text: Whenever you put one or more counters on a creature you control, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Surgical Barbarism
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. If its mana value is 3 or less, it also gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Brutal Sterility
card.text: Brutal Sterility deals 4 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Biohack
card.text: Biohack deals 6 damage to target creature. If you control creature with power 4 or greater as you cast this spell, Biohack deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Spore Burst
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Fungus or a creature with a spore counter on it. Spore Burst deals 4 damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle.

card.name: Evolutionary Pressure
card.text: When Evolutionary Pressure enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature. Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Sodden Skulker
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Sodden Skulker. When Sodden Skulker has two or more spore counters on it, remove them and transform it. {T}: Add {G}. --- (Back): Cordycephalopod

card.name: Cordycephalopod
card.text: Vigilance {T}: Add {G}. --- (Front): Sodden Skulker

card.name: Mold Worker
card.text: When Mold Worker enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control named Mold Worker. A deck can have any number of cards named Mold Worker.

card.name: Cautious Partisan
card.text: Flash When Cautious Partisan enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains shielded until end of turn. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.)

card.name: Specimen Sampler
card.text: When Specimen Sampler enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a land or double-faced card from among them and put that card into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Bilateral Screamer
card.text: When Bilateral Screamer enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. If that creature is a host or is augmented, instead put two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Capillary Entwiner
card.text: When Capillary Entwiner dies, draw a card.

card.name: Gantry Prowler
card.text: Vigilance, reach, trample

card.name: Engineered Mauler
card.text: Trample

card.name: Agonal Colony
card.text: Agonal Colony can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Whenever Agonal Colony deals combat damage to a player, you may return target card named Mold Worker from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Child of Kur
card.text: When Child of Kur enters the battlefield, you may have another creature you control fight target creature you don't control.

card.name: Enter the Fleshmaze
card.text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target permanent.

card.name: Arachnoid Adaptation
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it.

card.name: Artificial Brain
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Artificial Brain and a creature you control: Draw two cards.

card.name: Slurry Reabsorption
card.text: Return two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Parallax, Boundary Breaker
card.text: Emerge {4}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) When Parallax, Boundary Breaker enters the battlefield, put X +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. If it emerged, X is the sacrificed creature's mana value.

card.name: Meatmeld Embryo
card.text: Defender When Meatmeld Embryo enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, exile it face down, then shuffle. When Meatmeld Embryo dies, turn the exiled card face up. If it's a creature card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Goliath Mycocyst
card.text: Trample, ward {2} Whenever one or more counters are put on another creature you control, if they aren't +1/+1 counters, put that many +1/+1 counters on Goliath Mycocyst.

card.name: Saprotrophism
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may play lands from the top of your library. As long as a creature died under you control this turn, you may cast creature spells from the top of your library.

card.name: Mycocyst Incubator
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Mycocyst Incubator. When Mycocyst Incubator has two or more spore counters on it, remove them and transform it. Each other creature you control that's a Fungus or that has a spore counter on it gets +1/+1. --- (Back): Incubated Messiah

card.name: Incubated Messiah
card.text: When this creature transforms into Incubated Messiah, create two 1/1 green Fungus Drone creature tokens. Each other creature you control that's a Fungus or that has a spore counter on it gets +2/+2 and has trample. --- (Front): Mycocyst Incubator

card.name: Ren's Faithful
card.text: When Ren's Faithful enters the battlefield, choose one — • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature if it's a host or has augment. • Return target creature with augment you own and control to your hand. (The host remains on the battlefield.)

card.name: Meatcarver
card.text: When Meatcarver enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Parallax Guard
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast as long as a creature you controlled died this turn. When Parallax Guard enters the battlefield or dies, distribute two +1/+1 counters among creatures you control.

card.name: Lightgazer Sprout
card.text: Reach If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead. This creature gets +2/+2 as long as you have at least 5 life more than your starting life total.

card.name: Gestating Mass
card.text: When Gestating Mass dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Fracturing Specimen
card.text: As Fracturing Specimen enters the battlefield, distribute X +1/+1 counters among creatures you control.

card.name: Brood Mycocyst
card.text: Defender When Brood Mycocyst dies, if it had defender, return it to the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and it loses defender.

card.name: Supremacy of Flesh
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each of two other target creatures.

card.name: Bramblecrush
card.text: Destroy target noncreature permanent.

card.name: Hermetic Rover
card.text: Trample Whenever a creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Hermetic Rover. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Hypergenetics
card.text: Choose target creature you control. Double that creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Then it fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Pave Over
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and up to one other card with a mana ability and reveal them. Put all land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield tapped and any other cards revealed this way into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Mapping the Genome
card.text: Whenever a host enters the battlefield under your control or whenever you augment a creature, put a splice counter on Mapping the Genome. You may cast creature spells with mana value less than or equal to the number of splice counters on Mapping the Genome without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Splatter
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Fleshling
card.text: {W}: Fleshling gains shielded from the color of your choice until end of turn. (Prevent all damage that would be dealt to it by sources of that color.) {R}: Target creature can't block Fleshling this turn. {1}{R}{W}: Fleshling gains double strike until end of turn. {1}: Fleshling gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Wipe Out
card.text: Choose target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land. Return the chosen cards to their owners' hands. (You can't cast this spell unless you have legal choices for all its targets.)

card.name: Fleshtheft
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target creature or planeswalker. • Counter target creature spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Abomination Shaper
card.text: Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater attacks, it deals 1 damage to the player or permanent it's attacking.

card.name: Mycocardia
card.text: Enchant player When Mycocardia enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Fungus Drone creature token. Sources deal damage to enchanted player as though they had lifelink.

card.name: Hashua, Partisan Leader
card.text: When Hashua, Partisan Leader enters the battlefield, if you cast it, destroy up to one target double-faced permanent.

card.name: Surgical Servitor
card.text: When Surgical Servitor enters the battlefield, return target Equipment card or double-faced card from your graveyard to your hand. Equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate.

card.name: Callous Vivisector
card.text: You may activate augment abilities of creature cards in your graveyard. (This includes their back faces.) {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1, then draw a card.

card.name: Ruthless Anatomist
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Botanical Surge
card.text: Creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional spore counter on them. Each creature you control that's a Fungus or that has a spore counter on it has trample and haste.

card.name: Impassive Vivisectionist
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 3/3 green Human Horror creature token with trample.

card.name: Gnarled Subject
card.text: Whenever Gnarled Subject or another creature you control enters the battlefield or dies, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Organ Expert
card.text: When Organ Expert enters the battlefield, mill four cards. You may put a host card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. Augment abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate.

card.name: Glistening Aftermath
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Glistening Aftermath: Draw a card. Activate only if a creature died under your control this turn.

card.name: HMW Draft Archetypes HMW
card.text: {W}{U} BIONICS Progress is grafted. Use equipment and the creatures that leave them behind on death to succeed. {U}{B} AUGMENT Splice ungodly abominations together to prevail. {B}{R} FEROCIOUS Power 4 or greater is the key to victory. {R}{G} SPORES Your Fungi and spore counters will spread their blessings. {G}{W} LIFEGAIN Vitality is the name of the game. {W}{B} ATTRITION Your test subjects are expendable. Churn through them on your path to glory. {B}{G} AUGMENT Unwilling hosts will become your greatest monsters. {G}{U} AUGMENT Think big. Bigger. No, even bigger. {U}{R} UNSTABLE Gene counters will breed the man of tomorrow. {R}{W} UNSTABLE Attack aggressively, as your creatures use gene counters to out-compete your opponent.
